#include<iostream>
#include<sstream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    string str1,str2;
    int test;
    scanf("%d",&test);
    while(test--)
    {
           char str[1000];
           scanf("%s",str);
           int len=strlen(str);
           int i;
           for(i=0;i<len;i++)
           {
            char c=str[i];
            char d=str[i+1];
            stringstream s,m;
            s<<c;
            s>>str1;
            m<<d;
            m>>str2;
            str1=str1+str2; 
            int num;
            istringstream(str1)>>num;
            if(num<32)
            {
                string st;
                char e=str[i+2];
                stringstream p;
                p<<e;
                p>>st;
                str1=str1+st;
                int num1;
                istringstream(str1)>>num1;
                cout<<char(num1);
                i+2;i++;
            }
            else
            cout<<char(num);
            i++;
           }
           cout<<"\n";
    }
    
    return 0;
}
